name: Air Fryer Bang Bang Tofu
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Air-fried tofu that is seasoned on the inside, crispy on the outside, and dipped in a sweet-heat sauce for a party in your mouth with every bite. Serve in lettuce wraps if desired.
directions: Place tofu onto a plate lined with several paper towels
Cover with more paper towels and another plate
Set a 3- to 5-pound weight on top and press tofu for 30 minutes
Drain and discard any accumulated liquid and cut tofu into 1/2-inch cubes
Place cubed tofu in a bowl and drizzle with sesame oil
Gently stir and let sit for 20 minutes
Meanwhile, make bang bang sauce by whisking mayonnaise, sweet chili sauce, and Sriracha sauce together until smooth
Place panko in a separate bowl
Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix tofu with 1/2 cup bang bang sauce until evenly combined
Coat tofu in the panko bread crumbs and place in the basket of the air fryer, making sure tofu pieces do not overlap
Depending on the size of your air fryer, you may need to do this in batches
Shake and cook for 3 minutes more
Garnish with green onion and serve with remaining bang bang sauce
